en.title: Jump To The Field
en.text1: Our action takes place in sensitive environments where frustration often derived in tensions among refugees and locals. Conditions might be stressful and the work requires self-responsibility and maturity. Everything that NNK members do on the field affects how locals and refugees perceive NNK overall.
en.text2: NNK offers internships on the field by providing free accommodation, a basket with food and cleaning products, legal and psychological support, and a real humanitarian experience. If you feel ready to join the move, please check the requirements below and fulfill the form. Be patient. WeÂ´ll contact you soon.

messageSent.title: You message has been sent
messageSent.msgSent:
Thank you for writing us.
We'll contact you as soon as possible.
